citations.desc: INSTITUTIONAL ANIMAL CARE AND USE COMMITTEE (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
*** At the time of inspection Protocol .031 was reviewed and found to contain potentially painful/distressful
procedures; however a search for alternatives to these procedures had not been conducted. The principal
investigator must provide to the IACUC a search for alternatives and the methods and sources used to determine
that no alternatives were available for the welfare of the animals.
Correct by 10/15/14
An exit interview was conducted with facility personnel on 9/10/14.
Additional Inspectors
Lopinto John, Veterinary Medical Officer
Hadjis Tonya, Supervisory Animal Care Specialist

narrative:
2.31(d)(1)(2)
INSTITUTIONAL ANIMAL CARE AND USE COMMITTEE (IACUC).
***  At the time of inspection Protocol .031 was reviewed and found to contain potentially painful/distressful
procedures; however a search for alternatives to these procedures had not been conducted.  The principal
investigator must provide to the IACUC a search for alternatives and the methods and sources used to determine
that no alternatives were available for the welfare of the animals.
Correct by 10/15/14
An exit interview was conducted with facility personnel on 9/10/14.
Additional Inspectors
Lopinto John, Veterinary Medical Officer
Hadjis Tonya, Supervisory Animal Care Specialist
